top_comments.comment: Kêu gọi mỹ anh pháp đức nhật bản úc ấn độ nga và các nước đồng minh của mỹ và .EU hãy tham gia vào biển đông ok .và mỹ kêu gọi khồi EU châu âu và khối asian và khối châu phi và tây âu tham già bào biển đông mí vietnam ok
Mỹ hãy kêu gọi tất cả các nước EU và mỹ và các nước asian bao vây cấm vận trung quốc về kinh tế ok

There is no true cost because year after year the cost of those unsustainable programs will keep increasing forever!! It's not like these bills are a one time cost. The cost will always keep increasing which will require MORE spending bills and tax increases in the future to keep everything funded.
Kêu gọi mỹ hãy hợp tác mí nga và vietnam và tất cả nước nước anh pháp đức mỹ nhật bản ấn độ úc và các nước đồng minh của mỹ tham gia vào biển đông ok

The Republican-led states of Alaska, Mississippi, North Dakota, West Virginia, Kentucky, Arizona, Alabama, Montana and South Carolina are nine of the top ten states most dependent on aid from the federal government.  Four of the Top 5 states most dependent on welfare are the Republican-led states of Louisiana, West Virginia, Alabama and Mississippi. 🤔

The Republican-led states of Mississippi, Louisiana, Kentucky, Arkansas, West Virginia, Alabama, Oklahoma, Tennessee and South Carolina are the least educated states in the US. Predictably, US states with the highest poverty rate are the Republican-led states of Mississippi, Louisiana, Kentucky, Arkansas, West Virginia, Alabama, Oklahoma, Tennessee and South Carolina.

Since 1933, the US economy has grown at an annual average rate of 4.6 percent under Democratic presidents and 2.4 percent under Republicans.  The average income of Americans would be more than double its current level if the economy had grown at the Democratic rate for all of the past nine decades.  Ten of eleven U.S. recessions between 1953 and the present began under Republican presidents.

The UK GOVERNMENT said last week that it plans to be: FIRST major economy to "LEGALLY REQUIRE" Corporations report "Climate-Related" RISKS and OPPURTUNITIES. Proposed Legislation will apply         to many of "Largest Traded Companies" on LONDON STOCK EXCHANGE, Banks and Insurers, as well     as "Private Companies" with more than 500 EMPLOYEES and $690 million in Sales.
